评论概述: I like the solid colors better than the patterns...
评论详情: I have ordered 4 of these shirts, the solid army green and the black, and the floral print apricot, and the multicolor dark blue.  The sleeves on the solid color shirts are not sheer material as they are on the floral/patterned shirts.  Although the solid color shirts may be too warm in the sun and very warm weather, I like those shirts better and will enjoy them on cool days and all winter long.  I had expected to like the patterns better, but did not.  The apricot color is more pink than I expected.  They are synthetic, and the wrinkles did not wash out. However, all of the shirts pressed easily on a low setting with steam; I haven't worn or washed them since. Finally, the floral/print shirts have a white lining, so they are not see through; the solid colors don't have a liner or need one. I like the neckline and the length.
5'6 and 128lbs.  The medium was toooo big.  but i really like it. will exchange for a small
